description: This Dart source file defines a TransactionService class that provides methods to interact with a backend REST API for managing financial transactions. It includes functionalities to fetch, create, update, and delete transactions, handling category resolution and type determination internally.

classes.name: TransactionService
classes.description: A service class providing static methods for transaction management via HTTP requests.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches all transactions for the authenticated user from the backend API.

methods.name: createTransaction
methods.description: Creates a new transaction by sending data to the backend, resolving categories and setting types appropriately.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction with new data, similar to creation logic.
